About Me

Hi, my name is Kyle and I’m a Computer Science student at Elon University and a Le Wagon Alumni (Batch #269). I plan to graduate from Elon in 2023. I’m extremely interested in the creative potential of programming in both games and applications. I’m proficient in various programming languages, including Python, GameMakerStudio, and Ruby. I am a freelance tutor (Hire me!) and former swim coach. I am currently looking for employment!

Education

BS Computer Science

Elon, NC | 2018 - Current

Elon University is a mid-sized private university in North Carolina that is nationally recognized as the premier student-centered environment for experiential learning.

LeWagon

Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp

Oslo, Norway | August 2019

Change your life, learn to code. Le Wagon is ranked as the world's best coding bootcamp and has enabled thousands of people to change their careers. The bootcamp teaches students how to build a web application, from database management, to backend, to frontend design.

Walt Whitman High School

High School Diploma

Bethesda, MD | 2014 - 2018

Walt Whitman High School is a public high school in Bethesda, Maryland, United States. The school is named in honor of the American poet, Walt Whitman. The school serves grades 9-12 for the Montgomery County Public Schools.

Experience

Assistant Swim Coach

Carderock Springs Swim and Tennis Club

June 2017 - May 2018

I taught children from ages 3+ how to swim and supervised them as they demonstrated skills in the pool. I also coached older children and teenagers from 8-16 to swim competitively by using intensive swim workouts as well as dry-land exercizes.

Freelance Tutor

March 2018 - Present

I have tutored many people in programming languages like Java, frameworks like Ruby on Rails, or more general subjects like math, science, and english for high schoolers and college students.
